```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data_wide <- get_data_wide("data-large", "New York", "Madison")
```

```{r}
people <- create_dots(data_wide, num_people = 1000)
```

```{r}
base_map() %>% 
  add_people(2020, people)
```

```{r}
base_map() %>% 
  add_tracts(2020, data_wide) %>% 
  add_people(2020, people)
```

```{r}
data_long <- get_data_long("data-large", "New York", "Madison")
```
